member.name: M:NServiceBus.ConfigureWindsorBuilder.CastleWindsorBuilder(NServiceBus.Configure,Castle.Windsor.IWindsorContainer)
member.summary: Use the Castle Windsor builder passing in a preconfigured container to be used by nServiceBus.

member.name: M:NServiceBus.ObjectBuilder.CastleWindsor.WindsorObjectBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Instantites the class with a new WindsorContainer.

member.name: M:NServiceBus.ObjectBuilder.CastleWindsor.WindsorObjectBuilder.#ctor(Castle.Windsor.IWindsorContainer)
member.summary: Instantiates the class saving the given container.

member.name: M:NServiceBus.ObjectBuilder.CastleWindsor.WindsorObjectBuilder.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the container and all resources instantiated by the container.

member.name: M:NServiceBus.ObjectBuilder.CastleWindsor.WindsorObjectBuilder.BuildChildContainer
member.summary: Returns a child instance of the container to facilitate deterministic disposal of all resources built by the child container.
